D

DEFAULT_CHECK_INTERVAL_SEC - Static variable in class com.castlabs.sdk.drm.DrmDeviceTimeCheckerPlugin
Default value for the time in between checks
DrmDeviceTimeCheckerPlugin - Class in com.castlabs.sdk.drm
This plugin will perform periodic checks related to DRM licensing.
DrmDeviceTimeCheckerPlugin() - Constructor for class com.castlabs.sdk.drm.DrmDeviceTimeCheckerPlugin
Same as calling DrmDeviceTimeCheckerPlugin.DrmDeviceTimeCheckerPlugin(int) with DrmDeviceTimeCheckerPlugin.DEFAULT_CHECK_INTERVAL_SEC

onReceive(Context, Intent) - Method in class com.castlabs.sdk.drm.TimeChangeReceiver
 

T

TimeChangeReceiver - Class in com.castlabs.sdk.drm
Receive Intent.ACTION_TIME_CHANGED as well as Intent.ACTION_BOOT_COMPLETED in order to keep track of time offsets in regards to DRM Licenses.
TimeChangeReceiver() - Constructor for class com.castlabs.sdk.drm.TimeChangeReceiver
